about_the_game:
And here you thought love was only true in fairy tales. Little did you know, lust and trickery was just a single order away. Through Late Night Delivery, you'll see what happens when the protagonist's car breaks down and the only help you can get is from a short, curvy, half-dressed woman in a witch costume. You're invited in with a cozy place to spend the night and a warm slice of pie. But Moira is planning on bringing the trick with her treat.

In Late Night Delivery 2, the VCR repairman not only has to deal with the likes of Moira, but she has brought some company. Linda is getting a Halloween present from her mom, as the two take advantage of the one guy in town who doesn't realize handling these two is way out of his league.

The story expands with Late Night Delivery 3, exploring a new guy's unlucky evening and a new witch.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of highly erotic sexual content. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

short_description: Experience the horrifying Halloween-themed sensual mischievousness of "Late Night Delivery: The Bewitched Collection"! Now with an exclusive third chapter that expands on the plot further. Buy it today, enjoy it tonight~
